pages.title: Native Resources
pages.text: Compared to the common resources you were used to before, such as $(thing)Raw Copper$(), their crystalline counterparts are much more pure. On closer inspection: they almost appear surrounded by an invisible sheen, gently protecting them from outside forces. This shroud seems to be what protects $(thing)Native Copper$() from oxidization.

pages.title: Native Resources
pages.text: Growing materials in the $(l:magical_blocks/crystallarieum)Crystallarieum$(/l) yields this much purer variant than plain $(thing)Raw Ore$().$(br)Blasting it gets you the plain variant.

pages.title: Cinderhearth Smelting
pages.text: Blasting these in the $(l:magical_blocks/cinderhearth)Cinderhearth$() yields a higher output.
